member.name: T:Google.Api.Ads.Common.OAuth.Lib.AdsServiceLocator
member.summary: Provides a default implementation of Microsoft Common Service Locator, to be used with OAuth.Net library.
member.remarks: OAuth.net library uses Microsoft Common Service Locator library (http://commonservicelocator.codeplex.com/) for dependency injection. The default library implementation uses Castle Project, which adds another external library dependency on the Ads client libraries. To avoid this, we are providing a simple replacement to suit just the need of OAuth.Net library.

member.name: F:Google.Api.Ads.Common.OAuth.Lib.AdsServiceLocator.serviceLookup
member.summary: A map to store the registered types.

member.name: F:Google.Api.Ads.Common.OAuth.Lib.AdsServiceLocator.useMemoryStore
member.summary: Choose whether to use an in-memory store or session store for storing OAuth state.

member.name: M:Google.Api.Ads.Common.OAuth.Lib.AdsServiceLocator.#ctor
member.summary: Default public constructor.

member.name: M:Google.Api.Ads.Common.OAuth.Lib.AdsServiceLocator.RegisterDefaultServices
member.summary: Registers the default set of services provided by this service locator.
member.remarks: These are the types required by OAuth.Net library.

member.name: M:Google.Api.Ads.Common.OAuth.Lib.AdsServiceLocator.RegisterService(Google.Api.Ads.Common.OAuth.Lib.AdsServiceComponent)
member.summary: Registers a service component with this locator.

member.name: M:Google.Api.Ads.Common.OAuth.Lib.AdsServiceLocator.GetInstance(System.Type)
member.summary: Gets a default instance of the specified service type.
member.exception: Thrown if the object cannot be created. The inner exception contains more details about why the object could not be created.
member.remarks: This method never returns a null, failure to create an object always causes an ActivationException to be thrown.

member.exception: Thrown if the object cannot be created. The inner exception contains more details about why the object could not be created.
member.remarks: This method never returns a null, failure to create an object always causes an ActivationException to be thrown.

member.summary: The OAuth endpoint for obtaining request token.

member.summary: The OAuth endpoint for authorizing request token.

member.summary: Fetches the access token.

member.returns: True if the access token was fetched correctly, false otherwise.

member.name: T:Google.Api.Ads.Common.OAuth.Lib.OAuth2Provider
member.summary: Implements OAuth2 protocol, draft 10, web server flow for authenticating users. See http://code.google.com/apis/accounts/docs/OAuth2WebServer.html for details.

member.name: F:Google.Api.Ads.Common.OAuth.Lib.OAuth2Provider.OFFLINE_REDIRECT_URL
member.summary: The OAuth2 redirect url to be used if your application is a desktop application. To use this url, your client should be registered as an installed application on the API console.

member.name: F:Google.Api.Ads.Common.OAuth.Lib.OAuth2Provider.RESPONSE_TYPE
member.summary: Determines if the Google OAuth 2.0 endpoint returns an authorization code.

member.name: F:Google.Api.Ads.Common.OAuth.Lib.OAuth2Provider.AUTH_ENDPOINT
member.summary: The OAuth2 endpoint for obtaining an authorization token.

member.name: F:Google.Api.Ads.Common.OAuth.Lib.OAuth2Provider.TOKEN_ENDPOINT
member.summary: The OAuth2 endpoint for obtaining or refreshing an access token.

member.name: F:Google.Api.Ads.Common.OAuth.Lib.OAuth2Provider.REVOKE_ENDPOINT
member.summary: The OAuth2 endpoint for revoking a refresh token programmatically.

member.name: F:Google.Api.Ads.Common.OAuth.Lib.OAuth2Provider.clientId
member.summary: Indicates the client that is making the request. This value is obtained from the API console during application registration.

member.name: F:Google.Api.Ads.Common.OAuth.Lib.OAuth2Provider.redirectUri
member.summary: Determines where the response is sent. This should be a registered redirect uri on the API console.

member.name: F:Google.Api.Ads.Common.OAuth.Lib.OAuth2Provider.scope
member.summary: Indicates the API access your application is requesting. This is space delimited.

member.name: F:Google.Api.Ads.Common.OAuth.Lib.OAuth2Provider.state
member.summary: A parameter that your application can use for keeping state. The OAuth Authorization Server roundtrips this parameter.

member.name: F:Google.Api.Ads.Common.OAuth.Lib.OAuth2Provider.isOffline
member.summary: Indicates if your application needs to access APIs when the user is not present at the browser. This is defaulted to true.

member.name: F:Google.Api.Ads.Common.OAuth.Lib.OAuth2Provider.clientSecret
member.summary: The client secret obtained from the API console during application registration.during application registration.

member.name: F:Google.Api.Ads.Common.OAuth.Lib.OAuth2Provider.tokenType
member.summary: Indicates the type of token returned by the server. This field will always have the value Bearer for now.

member.name: F:Google.Api.Ads.Common.OAuth.Lib.OAuth2Provider.expiresIn
member.summary: The remaining lifetime on the access token.

member.name: F:Google.Api.Ads.Common.OAuth.Lib.OAuth2Provider.accessToken
member.summary: The token that can be sent to a Google API for authentication.

member.name: F:Google.Api.Ads.Common.OAuth.Lib.OAuth2Provider.refreshToken
member.summary: A token that may be used to obtain a new access token. Refresh tokens are valid until the user revokes access.

member.name: F:Google.Api.Ads.Common.OAuth.Lib.OAuth2Provider.config
member.summary: The configuration object to be used with this client.

member.name: M:Google.Api.Ads.Common.OAuth.Lib.OAuth2Provider.#ctor(Google.Api.Ads.Common.Lib.AppConfigBase)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Google.Api.Ads.Common.OAuth.Lib.OAuth2Provider.GetAuthorizationUrl
member.summary: Builds the OAuth2 authorization url.
member.returns: The Authorization url that the user needs to visit to authorize the application.

member.name: M:Google.Api.Ads.Common.OAuth.Lib.OAuth2Provider.FetchAccessAndRefreshTokens(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the OAuth access and refresh tokens.
member.param: The authorization code obtained from the Authorization url after the user authorizes the application to make API calls.
member.remarks: Refresh tokens are obtained only if access mode was set to offline.

member.name: M:Google.Api.Ads.Common.OAuth.Lib.OAuth2Provider.RefreshAccessToken
member.summary: Refreshes the access token.
member.remarks: This method should be used only when access mode is set to offline.

member.name: M:Google.Api.Ads.Common.OAuth.Lib.OAuth2Provider.RevokeRefreshToken
member.summary: Revokes the refresh token.

member.name: M:Google.Api.Ads.Common.OAuth.Lib.OAuth2Provider.GetAuthHeader(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the auth header.
member.param: The url for which auth header is to be generated.

member.name: M:Google.Api.Ads.Common.OAuth.Lib.OAuth2Provider.GetResponseText(System.Net.WebResponse)
member.summary: Gets the response text from a web response.

member.name: M:Google.Api.Ads.Common.OAuth.Lib.OAuth2Provider.ParseJsonObjectResponse(System.String)
member.summary: Parses a json object response.
member.remarks: This is not a full-blown json parser, it can handle only cases where the response is a json object without nested objects or arrays.

member.name: F:Google.Api.Ads.Common.OAuth.Lib.OAuth2Provider.oAuthTokensObtained
member.summary: Callback triggered when this provider obtains a new access token or refresh token from the OAuth server.
